00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"
00023 #include "ScannerMap.h"

00025 using namespace Hypertable;
00026 
00027 atomic_t ScannerMap::ms_next_id = ATOMIC_INIT(0);
00028 
00031 uint32_t ScannerMap::put(CellListScannerPtr &scanner_ptr,
00032                          RangePtr &range_ptr,
00033                          const TableIdentifier *table) {
00034   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00035   ScanInfo scaninfo;
00036   scaninfo.scanner_ptr = scanner_ptr;
00037   scaninfo.range_ptr = range_ptr;
00038   scaninfo.last_access_millis = get_timestamp_millis();
00039   scaninfo.table= *table;
00040   uint32_t id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_id);
00041   m_scanner_map[id] = scaninfo;
00042   return id;
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 
00049 bool
00050 ScannerMap::get(uint32_t id, CellListScannerPtr &scanner_ptr,
00051                 RangePtr &range_ptr, TableIdentifierManaged &table) {
00052   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00053   CellListScannerMap::iterator iter = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00054   if (iter == m_scanner_map.end())
00055     return false;
00056   (*iter).second.last_access_millis = get_timestamp_millis();
00057   scanner_ptr = (*iter).second.scanner_ptr;
00058   range_ptr = (*iter).second.range_ptr;
00059   table = (*iter).second.table;
00060   return true;
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 
00067 bool ScannerMap::remove(uint32_t id) {
00068   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00069   return (m_scanner_map.erase(id) == 0) ? false : true;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 void ScannerMap::purge_expired(uint32_t max_idle_millis) {
00074   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00075   uint64_t now_millis = get_timestamp_millis();
00076   CellListScannerMap::iterator iter = m_scanner_map.begin();
00077 
00078   while (iter != m_scanner_map.end()) {
00079     if ((now_millis - (*iter).second.last_access_millis) > max_idle_millis) {
00080       CellListScannerMap::iterator tmp_iter = iter;
00081       HT_WARNF("Destroying scanner %d because it has not been used in %u "
00082                "milliseconds", (*iter).first, max_idle_millis);
00083       ++iter;
00084       (*tmp_iter).second.scanner_ptr = 0;
00085       (*tmp_iter).second.range_ptr = 0;
00086       m_scanner_map.erase(tmp_iter);
00087     }
00088     else
00089       ++iter;
00090   }
00091 
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 uint64_t ScannerMap::get_timestamp_millis() {
00096   boost::xtime now;
00097   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00098   return ((uint64_t)now.sec * 1000LL) + ((uint64_t)now.nsec / 1000000LL);
00099 }
